title: Amazon's AI-Driven Sponsored Brands Campaigns See 45% Conversion Lift
summary: Amazon rolls out AI-generated ad creative and automated bidding for Sponsored Brands, with early adopters reporting significant conversion improvements and lower cost per acquisition.

title: Walmart Connect Overtakes Instacart as Second-Largest US Retail Media Network
summary: Walmart's retail media division posts $4.8B in annual revenue, surpassing Instacart Ads to become the No. 2 retail media network in the US behind Amazon, fueled by in-store and omnichannel data.

title: Omnichannel Personalization: Why Unified Commerce Data Is the New Competitive Moat
summary: Retailers investing in unified commerce platforms that merge online, in-store, and mobile data report 30% higher customer lifetime value than those with siloed channel strategies.

title: Social Commerce Sales to Hit $108B in 2026 as TikTok Shop and Instagram Checkout Scale
summary: Social commerce is projected to reach $108B in US sales this year, with TikTok Shop and Instagram Checkout driving most of the growth among Gen Z and millennial consumers.

title: Target Debuts AI-Powered In-Store Marketing Displays That React to Shoppers
summary: Target pilots AI-driven digital signage that adjusts promotions in real time based on foot traffic patterns, time of day, and local inventory levels across 200 test stores.

title: Shopify's AI Commerce Assistant Handles 30% of Merchant Marketing Tasks
summary: Shopify reports its Sidekick AI assistant now autonomously manages email campaigns, social posts, and product descriptions for over 500K merchants, freeing small business owners for strategic work.

title: Loyalty Programs Get Smarter: AI Predicts Churn 60 Days Before Customers Leave
summary: Retailers deploying AI-powered loyalty analytics can now predict customer churn with 89% accuracy up to 60 days in advance, enabling proactive retention campaigns that save an average of 22% of at-risk revenue.

title: Kroger and Albertsons Retail Media Networks Merge Post-Acquisition, Creating $3B Ad Juggernaut
summary: The combined Kroger-Albertsons retail media network leverages loyalty data from 85M households, making it a formidable competitor in the grocery advertising space with over $3B in projected revenue.
